snippet: The Metropolitan Transportation Authority said it would not provide refunds to riders who purchased 30-day or 7-day unlimited MetroCards before Hurricane Sandy.
abstract: Metropolitan Transportation Authority says that it will not provide refunds or credit on 30- or 7-day MetroCards for service disruptions that occurred during Hurricane Sandy.
lead_paragraph: The Metropolitan Transportation Authority said it would not provide refunds to riders who purchased 30-day or 7-day unlimited MetroCards before Hurricane Sandy.

headline.seo: No Refunds for Unlimited MetroCards Bought Before Hurricane
headline.main: MetroCards After Storm: M.T.A. Says No Refunds
